guaraní mythology

Free REST API to practice and prototyping.

Guide
MethodRoutes
GET/v1/myths/
GET/v1/myths/1 ( require id parameter )
POST/v1/myths/1 ( require id parameter )
PUT/v1/myths/1 ( require id parameter )
DELETE/v1/myths/1 ( require id parameter )

Example

fetch('https://guarani-myths.com/v1/myths/1')
  .then(res => res.json())
  .then(data => console.log(data))

Response

{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Taú and Keraná",
  "description": "This causes deep sadness and...",
  "image": "https://guarani-myths.com/images/...",
}

Reference

Paraguay Myths. (2022) Retrieved from Municipality of Yaguarón https://www.yaguaron.gov.py/mitos-del-paraguay/
